title: Billy Bragg's music bridges political themes with the intensely personal
description: Bragg's decades of activism and songwriting have only helped to crystallize and empower his thinking on what we need to make the world a better place.
itunes:title: Billy Bragg's music bridges political themes with the intensely personal
itunes:author: Raina Douris
itunes:summary: Bragg's decades of activism and songwriting have only helped to crystallize and empower his thinking on what we need to do to make the world a better place.
itunes:subtitle: Bragg's decades of activism and songwriting have only helped to crystallize and empower his thinking on what we need to do to make the world a better place.
content:encoded: Bragg's decades of activism and songwriting have only helped to crystallize and empower his thinking on what we need to make the world a better place.
